title: ScoreboardStats插件输入指令没反应是什么原因
author: res_js
txt_content:
#Main configuration

disabled-worlds:
  - world_nether
  - city

#This will not count vanished players in the online value
hide-vanished: false

Scoreboard:
  Title: '&a&lStats'
  #seconds
  # For instant updates you can or 1 and it will update every second
  Update-delay: 2
  Items:
    #The Title must have under 16 characters
    #Title: Type
    '&9Online': '%online%'
    '&9Money': '%money%'

#Let ScoreboardStats track stats (kills, deaths, mobkills, killstreak) You need no plugin for this
enable-pvpstats: false

#In minutes
PvPStats-SaveIntervall: 15

Temp-Scoreboard-enabled: false

Temp-Scoreboard:
  Title: '&a&lTop Kills'
  #%mob% | %kills% | %killstreak%
  Type: '%kills%'
  Color: '&9'
  #How many Players would be displayed
  Items: 5
  Intervall-show: 300
  Intervall-disappear: 300

pluginUpdate: true

上面是配置文件，以前装过一个Scoreboards 【http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-318231-1-1.html】 后来卸载了


然后装上ScoreboardStats就没反应了。输入显示和重载都没有反应。 求大神解答

replies.author: res_js
replies.txt_content: 没人吗，求解答。求解答。谢谢了
